shortName.message: Search the web using Scanguard's Safe Site tool

description.message: Safe Site helps block harmful and malicious URLs to improve your internet experience and keep you safe.

warningPage_title.message: WARNING! This website could harm your system...

warningPage_subTitle.message: Don't worry, we've blocked it for your protection

warningPage_categoryDescription_THREAT_T.message: This website has been identified as potentially harmful.  Attackers on this website may trick you into doing something dangerous that could comprimise your security.

warningPage_categoryDescription_VIRUSINF.message: This website has been identified as containing deceptive content.  Attackers on this website may trick you into doing something dangerous that could compromise your security.

warningPage_categoryDescription_SPYWARE.message: This website has been identified as containing deceptive content.  Attackers on this website may trick you into doing something dangerous that could compromise your security.

warningPage_categoryDescription_PHISHING.message: This website has been identified as containing deceptive content.  Attackers on this website may trick you into doing something dangerous that could compromise your security.

warningPage_categoryDescription_MALWARE.message: This website has been identified as containing deceptive & malicious content.  Attackers on this website may trick you into doing something dangerous that could compromise your security.

warningPage_categoryDescription_SOCIAL_E.message: This website has been identified as containing deceptive content.  Attackers on this website may trick you into doing something dangerous that could compromise your security.

warningPage_categoryDescription_UNWANTED.message: This website has been identified as containing unwanted software.  This program likely contains adware, spyware or other intrusive and malicious behavior.

warningPage_categoryDescription_POTENTIA.message: This website has been identified as containing unwanted software.  This program likely contains adware, spyware or other intrusive and malicious behavior.

warningPage_whitelistText.message: I trust this website, do not flag again
